Detailed Description

A ColumnVectorAlias class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The ColumnVectorAlias class provides all the functionality from the MatrixAlias class, but add specific functions intended for column vectors. It also has specific column vector write functions.

Definition at line 1810 of file matrix.h.

const unsigned int  size
)  [inline]
 

Default constructor.Pointer constructor.

To create a column vector that will access a pre-available data array.

Parameters:
data Pointer to data array. This will be the data storage for the matrix.
size Number of rows the vector has.
